• PET: Improved handling of MATLAB dictionaries and structures containing arrays.
  • PET: Allow non-float outputs from test benches when connected to a subproblem Problem Input.
  • Visualizer: Updated to Visualizer 2.7.1. Highlights:
    • Added visualizer Sets functionality.
    • Fixed issue where .csv file launch was case-sensitive (files ending in .CSV could not be launched in standalone mode).
  • CAD: Removed warnings about MATE alignment.
  • Design importer: improvements to error handling
  • Results Browser: limit amount of progress message history stored to prevent issues with long-running jobs or jobs with large numbers of iterations.
  • PCB Manufacturing: updated Octopart support to use new v4 REST API.
  • Various bug fixes and improvements.
